name: Solenars Edge Rebirth
description: Three lost orphans band together to set out on a journey that transcends the boundaries of imagination and retrieve the pieces of a legendary gem, all while keeping the darkness at bay alongside a colorful cast of unique characters.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows XP / Vista / 7 Processor: 2.0 Ghz  Intel Pentium 4 or AMD Athlon XP Memory: at least 512MiB RAM MB RAM Graphics: 1024x768 video resolution Storage: 641 MB available space Sound Card: Yes
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows 8.1 / 10 Processor: 2.0 Ghz Intel Pentium 4 or AMD Athlon XP Memory: at least 512MiB RAM MB RAM Graphics: 1024x768 video resolution Storage: 641 MB available space Sound Card: Yes
